label: thm-canonical-logistic-validity
label_text: The Canonical Logistic Function is a Valid Rescale Function
full_statement_text: The **Canonical Logistic Rescale Function** defined in [](#def-canonical-logistic-rescale-function-example) satisfies all four conditions of the **Axiom of a Well-Behaved Rescale Function** ([](#def-axiom-rescale-function)).
